extendedInfo.description: âAdapted from the 3RD BEST-SELLING Indie PSN game of 2011, Test Yourself!ââPart of the Boost Yourself series of games!âBoost Your Memory comes packed with a series of fun tests, developed with the help of real psychology professionals, designed to stretch the bounds of your recollection capabilities and determine the capacity and precision of your long-term and short-term memory!These tests include:*FLASH TEST*â You saw something flash? Prove it by marking the proper cells in a grid*EXPRESS MEMORY*â See how many unique icons you can pick out from a sea of others!*IMPRINTING*â Test your ability to recall associations between certain icons and words!*MEMORY LIMIT*âPush the limits of your sequential memory as you recall increasing sequences*MAPPING*â Memorize complex maze layouts as you guide your friendly companion to safetyBy finishing all of the tests youâll receive a professional evaluation of your memory abilities; even if your results were not what you were expecting, donât fret â the assessment also comes with handy and helpful tips for improvement. Because you can test yourself daily, be sure to sharpen your skills and track your day-to-day growth by putting those tips to good use in training mode. See how your personal best stacks up against your friends and claim your place atop the online leaderboards!Boost Your Memory Features:â Self-Test Mode â Gauge your abilities and see where you standâ Training Mode â Sharpen your skills until your next self-testâ Expert Analysis â Receive professional assessments of your abilitiesâ Self-Improvement â Assessments also come with helpful tips for personal growthâOnline Leaderboards â See how you stack up against your friends and othersSo donât hesitate (for fear of forgetting!!) to pick up your own copy of Boost Your Memory today!

reviews.title: Looks good, but....
reviews.comment: I like the rest of the features, but the flash test always stops functioning halfway into it on my tab.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Training!
reviews.comment: The games  here are varied and do work out your memory. The problem now is that I am able to memorize all the icons and words in the Imprinting game. This would be 5* if the Imprinting game had more words and if there were either more icons or if the icons were randomly drawn every week or so.
reviews.author: Bernard Mesa

reviews.title: Good idea but some anoying aspects
reviews.comment: \"Back\" closes the app. The dialog \"End?\" is needed. Long start of the app - why I should see that logo every time? I just need get fast to the  tests and not to leave app accidentally. This does apply to all vendor\'s apps. Why they all have not working  links to  apps that say \"soon\" when few of them are allready on the market?
reviews.author: Viktoras \305\240idlauskas

reviews.title: Occupation suggestions?
reviews.comment: The app works just fine but there is no reason to have subjective judgments in the test results. I highly doubt the creators surveyed a population so I don\'t know where they are getting their data from.
reviews.author: Daniel Bergh

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: They need to stop the docking ads from poping up while I\'m in the middle of the game. THIS IS HORRIBLE
reviews.author: Kristo Sivong

reviews.title: Can\'t turn off sound
reviews.comment: If i could turn the sound off i would like it. But it is annoying with the sound. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User
